Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: トーマ
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma

Entry.JapaneseText: テルアラ街道沿いの小屋
Entry.EnglishText: Tel'alla Hostel

Entry.JapaneseText: テルアラ街道沿いの小屋
Entry.EnglishText: Tel'alla Hostel

Entry.JapaneseText: トーマ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma!!

Entry.JapaneseText: そこの小屋に ヒューマの娘がいるだろう。 命が惜しければ、娘を渡せ。
Entry.EnglishText: There is a Huma girl in that hostel over there, no? If you value your lives, hand her over to me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 誰が渡すかよ!! おまえのほうこそ、姉貴や クレアさんを返しやがれ！
Entry.EnglishText: Like hell we're gonna do that! You'd better be the one to return Claire and Selena to us!

Entry.JapaneseText: ほう、そうか…… ならば、死ね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, is that how it is? Fine then, die.

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐああぁぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaaagh!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぬうううッ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Urghh!

Entry.JapaneseText: わああああッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Yaaaaah!

Entry.JapaneseText: きゃあぁぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaaaah!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁぁぁぁぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Waaah!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Hilda>……おまえ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>...you...!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから言っただろう？ 命が惜しければ娘を渡せ、と。
Entry.EnglishText: What did I just tell you? If you valued your lives, you should have listened.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたも能力者……!?
Entry.EnglishText: You're a Force user, too!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ……<Blue>王の盾<White>のね。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes...of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: どういうコト……？ じゃあ、サニイタウンで会った <Hilda>のお母さんは……？
Entry.EnglishText: What do you mean...? What about your mother back in Sunnytown...?

Entry.JapaneseText: お金で雇っただけで、 何の関係もないわ。 私に母親なんていない……
Entry.EnglishText: She was just someone I paid to play along. That woman isn't related to me. It's not like I even have a mother...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアや…… セレーナさんの話も……
Entry.EnglishText: Then what you said about Claire and Selena...

Entry.JapaneseText: 会った事もないわ。 名前を利用しただけ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've never met them. I merely used their names.

Entry.JapaneseText: だまし討ちなんて…… 汚ねえぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Using them to trick us... That's dirty as hell!

Entry.JapaneseText: だまされるほうが悪いのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's your fault for falling for it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 許せねえ…… 絶対、許せねえッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: You'll pay... You'll pay for this!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>！ こいつらを皆殺しにしろ！
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>! Kill them all!

Entry.JapaneseText: くっ！ だから言っただろうが。 くだらん意地のために 大事な角を折ったりするから こんなふがいない事になるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Tch! What did I tell you? Breaking off your horns for such an asinine reason... Is there any wonder why you're such a disappointment?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……角なんて…… 私には必要ない……！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't need...my horns...!

Entry.JapaneseText: もういい！ <Red>混ざり物<White>め。 力も出せず、任務もまともに 果たせないおまえに、もう用はない！
Entry.EnglishText: Enough, you <Red>mongrel<White>. You're a weakling who couldn't even complete this task. I have no use for someone like you!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は……まだやれる!!
Entry.EnglishText: I... I can still fight!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 角とか、混ざり物とか、 何を言ってるんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Horns? A mongrel? What's he talking about?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まさか、<Hilda>は？
Entry.EnglishText: It can't be... Is <Hilda> a...?

Entry.JapaneseText: そのとおり、<Hilda>は……
Entry.EnglishText: That's right. She's...

Entry.JapaneseText: 黙れ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Shut up!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん、こいつらにも おまえのみじめな正体を 教えてやれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Tch, why don't I show these guys just how disgusting you really are?

Entry.JapaneseText: いやぁぁぁ！ やめて……！
Entry.EnglishText: Nooo! Stop!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマに、角が……!?
Entry.EnglishText: A Huma...with horns!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……見ないで……見るな!!
Entry.EnglishText: Don't look... Don't look at me!

Entry.JapaneseText: こいつは、<Red>ハーフ<White>だ。 ヒューマでもガジュマでもない 混ざり物の出来損ないさ！
Entry.EnglishText: She is a <Red>Half<White>. Neither a Huma nor a Gajuma, but a failure born of miscegenation!

Entry.JapaneseText: うそでしょ……？ ヒューマとガジュマの間の 子供なんて……
Entry.EnglishText: He's lying, right...? To think that a Huma and Gajuma could produce a child...

Entry.JapaneseText: うそも何も、こいつの頭を 見ればわかるだろう？ この角こそ、ヒューマとガジュマの 間に生まれた呪われし子の証だ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not lying. One look at the top of her head and it's obvious, isn't it? She's a cursed child born of a Huma and Gajuma, and those horns are proof of that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かに角……そして尻尾は ハーフが持って生まれる ものだと聞くが……
Entry.EnglishText: Those are definitely horns... I've heard that Halfs supposedly possess tails as well, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、ハーフである事を 隠すために角を折ったというのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: Don't tell me you broke off your horns to conceal the fact that you're a Half!?

Entry.JapaneseText: バカな女だ…… 角がハーフのフォルスを 高めている事ぐらい、 わかっていただろうに。
Entry.EnglishText: What a stupid woman... Doing that, even though you knew that horns boost the power of a Half.

Entry.JapaneseText: まあ、それでも泣きつかれたから、 お情けで使ってやってたが、 もうおしまいだな。
Entry.EnglishText: You were a blubbering mess when you came to me begging for help, and I took pity on you and gave you this task. Look how that turned out.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな……私はまだやれる…… こいつらを……倒して…… 純粋な<Yellow>ヒト<White>の身体をもらうんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: No... I can still do it... I can defeat them, and... And get a pure body...

Entry.JapaneseText: 純粋な身体をもらう？ 馬鹿が！ 生まれつきの身体を 変える事などできるものか！
Entry.EnglishText: A pure body? You're a moron! You can't change the body you were born with!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな…… 約束したはずよ、トーマ!! こいつらを倒したら、 この憎き身体を捨てて……
Entry.EnglishText: But... No... You promised me, Tohma! If I killed them, I could get rid of this disgusting body and...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはだまされているんだ、<Hilda>。 この男に……利用されているだけだ！
Entry.EnglishText: You're being deceived, <Hilda>. This man...he's just using you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん！ 角さえあれば、 楽しい夢を見ていられたものを！
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph! If you at least had your horns, I would have kept you chasing that sweet dream of yours.

Entry.JapaneseText: 夢って……どういう事？
Entry.EnglishText: Dream...? What do you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ハーフの並外れた能力が欲しくて、 おまえをその気にさせただけだ。 角を折っても、そこそこやれるだろうと 思ったが、所詮は混ざり物だな。
Entry.EnglishText: I only took you in wanting the incredible power of a Half for myself. I thought you might be of use even without your horns, but you're nothing more than a mongrel.

Entry.JapaneseText: ひどい……
Entry.EnglishText: You monster...

Entry.JapaneseText: だまされたほうが 悪いのだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't it your fault for falling for it?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ひどい……ひどい…… ……ひどい……
Entry.EnglishText: You're cruel...cruel...cruel...

Entry.JapaneseText: まずい!! 暴走が始まるよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Uh-oh! She's about to lose it!

Entry.JapaneseText: 少しは役立ちそうだな。 ハーフの能力を見せてみろ、 <Hilda>!!
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like you might still have some use. Show me what a Half can really do, <Hilda>!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁぁぁぁぁぁ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaaaaghh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふははははは……
Entry.EnglishText: Muhahahaha...

Entry.JapaneseText: 待て、トーマ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, Tohma!

Entry.JapaneseText: うっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、<Hilda>を このままにしておくわけには いかない！
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, we can't just leave <Hilda> like this!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……くっ！ そうか！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Tch! You're right!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ……ああ…… あうう……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Aah...aah...uuh...

Entry.JapaneseText: よせ、死にたいのか!!
Entry.EnglishText: Stop! Are you trying to get yourself killed?

Entry.JapaneseText: やめろ、おまえはもう……
Entry.EnglishText: Stop it, you're already...

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aagh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>さんッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>!

Entry.JapaneseText: イ、イテェ…… 四つ星の攻撃だぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: Owchie... That was a four-star attack...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんの、つもり…… なんで私を死なせてくれないの？
Entry.EnglishText: ...What are you doing? Why won't you just let me die?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんで死ななきゃ ならねぇんだよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Why do you even feel the need to die...!?

Entry.JapaneseText: イテテテ……
Entry.EnglishText: Owwie, oww...

Entry.JapaneseText: どんな理由があるにせよ、 親からもらった大事な命を 軽々しく捨てようなんて、 おれは許せねえんだよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care what your reasons are! I won't let you just throw away the life your parents gave you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ずっとこのハーフの身体で 生き続けるくらいなら…… 死んだほうがましよ……
Entry.EnglishText: If I have to live in the body of a Half forever, then I'd rather die...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どうしてだ？ ハーフの何が悪い？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Why? What's so bad about being a Half?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたにはわからない……
Entry.EnglishText: You wouldn't understand...

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなのは見た目に過ぎない…… ガジュマやヒューマや…… ハーフなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: Being a Huma, or Gajuma, or even a Half... That's just on the outside...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマにもガジュマにも 受け入れてもらえない 私の気持ちが……
Entry.EnglishText: To be accepted by neither Huma nor Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: どちらにも石を投げられ続けた 私の気持ちが…… あんたにわかるわけない!!
Entry.EnglishText: To have stones thrown at you from both sides... You couldn't possibly understand what it's like!

Entry.JapaneseText: ハーフなんかに…… 生まれたくなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: I never asked...to be born as a Half...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まだ息はあります。 急いで手当てをしないと……！
Entry.EnglishText: ...She's still breathing, but we need to get her treated right away!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、<Tytree>。 おまえたちには悪いが サニイタウンに戻ってもいいか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, <Tytree>. I know you two won't like it, but is it all right if we return to Sunnytown?

Entry.JapaneseText: 放っとくワケには行かねぇだろ！ なあ、<Veigue>？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, we can't just abandon her! Right, <Veigue>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Right.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 急ごう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's hurry.

Entry.JapaneseText: どんな理由があるにせよ、 親からもらった大事な命を 軽々しく捨てようなんて、 おれは許せねえんだよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care what your reasons are! I won't let you just throw away the life your parents gave you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どうしてだ？ ハーフの何が悪い？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Why? What's so bad about being a Half?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたにはわからない……
Entry.EnglishText: You wouldn't understand...

Entry.JapaneseText: どちらにも石を投げられ続けた 私の気持ちが…… あんたにわかるわけない!!
Entry.EnglishText: To have stones thrown at you from both sides... You couldn't possibly understand what it's like!

Entry.JapaneseText: ハーフなんかに…… 生まれたくなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: I never asked...to be born as a Half...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
